summary: This document is a classified message regarding a subject described as leftist but anti-communist and strongly anti-American. The agency wants to develop information on his current political beliefs and why the subject wanted to visit China. They want to evaluate answers to determine his ability to provide intel, with a view toward recruiting him for a briefed mission or residence in China. The message also discusses the possibility that the subject may have been asked to carry back messages, money, or perform other services in Mexico by the Chinese communists.
title: Classified Message Regarding Subject's Political Beliefs and Visit to China
